text_logic_form: Find the length of the hypotenuse of the right triangle $CAB$.
dissolved_text_logic_form: Find the length of the hypotenuse of the right triangle $CAB$.
diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $AC$ is $3$ units.
The length of the line $AB$ is $4$ units.
The lines $AC$ and $AB$ are perpendicular to each other.
line_instances: There are lines $AB$, $AC$, and $BC$, forming the right triangle $CAB$.
